DEG Digital | Salesforce Commerce Cloud (back-end and front-end) | Pittsburgh, PA | FULLTIME | ONSITE

DEG is a Salesforce Gold consulting partner. Commerce cloud (formerly Demandware) is a 100% cloud based ecommerce platform.

If you aren't already a certified commerce cloud developer, DEG should be happy to get you up to speed. If you know your way around Javascript, you'll do great. Tell them I sent you.
